val:
120,000 years ago - we are apes that lives on trees and so as big serpents..

We have one of the most powerful eyesights in the animal kingdom. By far the only animals that are better than us are birds of prey like owls, eagles and hawks. But how we get to have a brain where half of it is dedicated for image processing - one theory is how serpents have helped us to be of such hundreds of thousands of years ago.
